attributes.action: sanction a full, independent, public inquiry into the deaths at Deepcut army barracks between 1995 and 2002.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No satisfactory answers have yet been provided to account for these deaths.  Had the deaths of these young people been at a particular university, there would have been public and transparent accountability.  That is all the families of these young people demand, and deserve.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "sanction a full, independent, public inquiry into the deaths at Deepcut army barracks between 1995 and 2002."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21678


Prime Minister's Office
